title: 06/03/2021 - HOUR 1 - Clippers, Lakers, Luka, Nets-Bucks
itunes:title: 06/03/2021 - HOUR 1 - Clippers, Lakers, Luka, Nets-Bucks
description:
The Clippers are on the verge of imploding

Luka Doncic is an amazing player and he's only 22 years old

Colin doesn't see the Lakers winning tonight

The Nets-Bucks series should be interesting


Guest: Ric Bucher
